snippet.title: Horace Accolades Trailer [ESRB]
snippet.description:
Horace invites players to overcome challenging puzzles and defeat difficult bosses while evoking a range of emotions that will leave some laughing, crying and cheering their way through a touching narrative. The latest free game update treats new and existing players to more ways to interact with this pixel perfect world, including the Time Machine, Cinema, Gramophone and more!

For more info ➡️ https://bit.ly/2NpeE5S

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
